channel.title: Server Wont Run!
channel.description:
Hello, all.
I have a server called Simmonscape. I was sooo happy when it said "* running on port 43594" I tried going on my server, when it said "error connecting to server" But, when i put my defult ip in for the ip (127.0.0.1) it connected and the server was running, I have simmonscape.no-ip.biz on my no-ip duc and i portforwarded, but i cannot seem to run the server on *. PLEASE HELP ME!

item.title: Server Wont Run!
item.dc:creator: @magicrcher_2 magicrcher 2
item.description:
@magicrcher_2 wrote:

bro i know how you feel i made a hmachie server then found out that no one can play on it but me i kind give up no

Read full topic

item.title: Server Wont Run!
item.dc:creator: @BloodyBooger BloodyBooger
item.description:
@BloodyBooger wrote:

WTF!

I’m running my server and playing on my defult ip (127.0.0.1)

and no-one can loggin but me!

My server is running, and my no-ip duc is on…

But i cant seem to get the problem…!

Please help me!

Read full topic

item.title: Server Wont Run!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Oh god…

RULES:

Your server: YOU Connect with 127.0.0.1
Your server: OTHERS Connect with your No-ip (EX: Myip.no-ip.org)
Others server: YOU Connect with their No-Ip (EX: Theirip.no-ip.org)
Others server: THEY Connect with 127.0.0.1

I dont get how this is so hard that we get more then 5 topics a day about it…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Wont Run!
item.dc:creator: @xxx_master_xxx xxx master xxx
item.description:
@xxx_master_xxx wrote:

Rich:

you’re supposed to connect to 127.0.0.1, as you’re hosting it from your own computer, others connect through the no-ip

you’re supposed to connect to 127.0.0.1, as you’re hosting it from your own computer, others connect through the no-ip
[/quote] WHOA i didnt know that thank you!!![/quote] So wat do i change back now =/

Read full topic

@_Rich wrote:

if you did everything correctly, then yes.
